entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • POST without Content-Length - 411 Length required #45495
  • Blazor WASM with MSAL auth in Safari throws System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: TypeError: Load failed #45494
  • .NET 6 AmbiguousMatchException Mixed Technology App #45493
  • Update TFM to net8.0 #45492
    8.0-preview1
  • Hosting bundle downgrade error when 6.0.11 exists #45491
  • Perf improvement: https, plaintext #45490
  • Perf regression: endpoint, mvc #45485
  • _blazor websocket error #45484
  • Force use of https on NavigationManager #45483

Closed

  • Kestrel stops listening/responding to requests after some time (only after updating to .NET 7.0) #45215
  • Question : Should Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.HealthChecks extension respond success to HTTP PUT/POST/DELETE methods ? #45258
  • Route tooling broke source-build #42927
  • Perf improvement: json #45481
  • Unstated build dependency for e2e tests + tests won't run #41408
  • IL2070 error when building in source-build #43253
  • CA1825 error when building in source-build #43461
  • IDE0060 error when building in source-build #43462
  • Blazor WASM/Server cannot read video with transparent channel on Safari IOS #45487
  • Referenced Razor Class Library Component Reporting Error RZ10012 #45427
  • Calling Javascript interop from inside OnAfterRenderAsync throw exception #45489
  • ControllerLinkGeneratorExtensions throw ArgumentException #43845
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Analyzers: Cache route usage model and reuse in RouteHandlerAnalyzer #45486
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • [Hosting] Add {OriginalFormat} to start & stop log state objects #45253
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix SignInAsync docs to reference DefaultSignInScheme #45488
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] Use non-localized 8.0.x links in installer #45412
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 8.0-preview1
  • Cleanup Mvc Analyzers #42754
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix scheme nullability in link generation methods #45467
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Remove allocation of logger name from constructor of Renderer #45480
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Resolve all descriptors from registry #45436
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • fix trace id value, introduce traceparent #44680
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2062418 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22606.10 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
